title: 221 - How Personal Life Experience Leads to Deeply Authentic Work w/ Suzy Ultman PART 2
description:
PART 2 of my conversation with my friend Suzy Ultman!

THIS IS THE PART WHERE we go DEEP into Suzy's life story as she graciously shares her experiences with having a sibling with terminal cancer, moving through a divorce and finding a self worth fighting for. We also talk about how these formative life experiences translate to new depths in your creative work.

This conversation was deeply transformative for me as a person and artist and I know it will be the same for you!

Some topics covered in this episode:

  • EXCERCISE
  • ADHD / ASPERGERS
  • LEFT BRAIN VS RIGHT BRAIN
  • Moving through bad news
  • Moving through close ones dealing with cancer
  • Working through divorce
  • Making deeply authentic work

THANK YOU SUZY FOR SUCH A LOVELY WARM CONVERSATION AND THE GIFT OF SHARING YOUR STORY WITH US!

Suzy Ultman
https://www.suzyultman.com/
Instagram.com/suzyultman

Patreon Patron Shoutout!
Thank you Austin Saylor! Check out AUSTIN'S work:
https://www.austinsaylor.com/
https://www.instagram.com/ItsAustinSaylor/
